plot: DOUBLE AGENT is an action thriller about a super spy who spends his final few moments gagged and bound in the back of a truck trying to remember how he was captured and who he really is.
title: Double Agent
plot_es: DOUBLE AGENT is an action thriller about a super spy who spends his final few moments gagged and bound in the back of a truck trying to remember how he was captured and who he really is.
plot_en: DOUBLE AGENT is an action thriller about a super spy who spends his final few moments gagged and bound in the back of a truck trying to remember how he was captured and who he really is.
